idea-plugin.name: Adaptive Caret Scroll
idea-plugin.description:
Adaptive Caret Scroll: Enhanced Scrolling Behavior for JetBrain's Editors

AdaptiveCaretScroll modifies the default scrolling behavior of the JetBrain editors to automatically adjust the view when the caret nears the top or bottom edges.

Functionalities:

  • Automatically triggers editor scrolling when the caret is within a user-defined distance from the top or bottom edge.
  • Provides configuration options for setting the distance from the top and bottom edges where scrolling is activated.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Relative Paddings Feature

It is now possible to set a editor window relative padding. This makes it easier to work with editor windows of different sizes.

Bug Fix

If the top and bottom paddings overlap, the scrolling falls back to centered scrolling
